Other Information.Additional Info: Retention rate of U50/P filter for methylbenzene: 91.7%
Retention rate of U50/P filter for ethylbenzene: 88.6%

Sieving Mechanism: Selective adsorption based on hydrogen bonding and microporous structure

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas adsorption isotherms and breakthrough experiments
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: U50/P filter shows retention rates of 91.7% for methylbenzene and 88.6% for ethylbenzene at 298 K, 101 kPa, and 5000 ppm

Other Information.Additional Info: The UiO-66-NH2 loading ratio in the U50/P filter is 41.9 ± 0.1 wt%. The material exhibits high air permeability and stable performance over 8 hours.
